name: @carbon/type
description: Typography for digital and software products using the Carbon Design System

scripts.build: yarn clean && bundler bundle src/index.js --name CarbonType && bundler sassdoc 'scss/**/*.scss' -i '**/{_inlined,vendor}**' && bundler inline && bundler check 'scss/*.scss'
scripts.clean: rimraf css es lib umd scss/_inlined scss/vendor
